name: TypeRacer
description:
TypeRacer is my first entry for the Ludum Dare (LD41).

The theme was combine two incompatible genres, so i combined a racing game with a typing game, the mechanic is so simple: you have to write the words that appear on the screen as fast as you can so your car can move as far as possible.

Hopefully you will have the record :)

Sorry for my bad english, hope you enjoy it.
